item.title: Simple Machine Forums? :x
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

sg846:

How would i install it? Sorry it this is in the wrong section, please move if it is. But anyways I don’t know how to install it lol, can anyone help?

You need a site with FTP and MySQL (Of any sort)

Unzip the file into a folder (can be any)

(if you don’t have it already) Get Filezilla (google it)

Add a website to filezilla (pretty self explanatory)

If you want the forums to be the main page upload all files within that folder you made above to the public_html folder. if not, upload the main folder and change the name accordingly.

Go to the web address. if you have it in a sub folder go to www.yoursite.com/foldername/

Hope I helped.

Read full topic
